turns.utterance: I love to start hiking! It seems like such a great way to spend a day. Do you enjoy hiking?
turns.response: I do sometimes. My wife hikes a lot with our baby. I like to hike in the countryside or on trails

turns.utterance: That would be fun! Can you recommend a good hiking trail?
turns.response: i know several good trails. One of them is the Superior Hiking Trail (310-mile) it's in northeastern Minnesota that follows the overlooking lake Superior

turns.utterance: That would be a beautiful hike! Do you usually just hike for a few hours or do you spend a few days on the trail?
turns.response: Depends on my mood and how i feel. One time I went on this long appalachian national scenic trail and it was awesome! I've seen some wild animals

turns.utterance: Ooh! I'll bet that was a fun hike! What kind of equipment would someone need to start hiking?
turns.response: if you go on a short day hike ( which is completed in one day) you don't really need much, just comfortable shoes and clothes and water

turns.utterance: Thanks for the advice! I cant wait to take my first hike!
turns.response: Also you probably need some other hiking equipment like bug spray, sunscreen and maybe some bandaids

phrase: i am too old to hike i am in my seventies.
i cant wait to take my first hike!
